name: A long lasting decision...
description:
A small decision based game, where you need to decide that the person goes to Heaven or Hell, based on YOUR common sense.

The music was made by my good friend (ig: david_bolla1) . I made all the "art" and programming (ig:  turogombocz). I want to develop this game further in the future with all of my side projects.

This game was made for Mini Jam 69
